Laboratory for Ninh Binh Fine Coal Based Urea Plant

Ninh Binh Fine Coal Based Urea Plant is the Vietnamese national key construction project, and it is the world's first comprehensive system set of coal powder dry gasification, transformation, purification, ammonia synthesis and urea synthesis fertilizer production plant. The owner of the project is the Vietnam National Chemical Corporation (VINACHEM) and they have strong strength and resource advantages.

With years of international project experiences, PKchem (HK) again wins the laboratory EPC project. The project includes from the technical requirements of coal field analysis, water analysis, lubricating oil analysis to synthetic ammonia and urea analysis, and design and construction are also required by the owner. With the spirit of pursuing of perfect quality, PKchem was proven and once again won the praise of the project management.
